name: Make A Wish Ring (Red)
description: The Make A Wish Ring interprets the moment of happiness when blowing out the candles on a cake. The iconic birthday cake candleholder is transformed into a piece of jewellery that serves as a keepsake of a special day. Buried in a cake as surprise or presented in its beautiful packaging Make A Wish Ring will turn anyone’s birthday into a memorable event. The Make A Wish Rings are fabricated using a new additive manufacturing technique better known as 3D Printing or Rapid Prototyping, where a high power laser fuses small particles of nylon into a 3-dimensional object. The products are then hand dyed to achieve bright colors whilst keeping the soft, powder-like texture specific to the printing process. This technique allows the transformation from a generic mass-produced item into a unique and exclusive gift that will be worn with pride. Material: 3D printed nylon, hand dyed

name: Shadow Coasters (Set of 4)
description: Inspired by the shadows on a coffee table, this set of 100% wool felt coasters is the ideal companion for cozy winter evenings sharing a warming cup of tea or hot chocolate. The set of Shadow Coasters comprises of 4 coasters, one of each colour (pink, purple, light grey and dark grey). The coasters are suitable for mugs up to 8cm in diameter and care instructions are included. Material: 100% wool felt (5mm thick) Flat packed dimensions: 18x13cm Made in the UK

name: Shadow Coasters (single)
description: Inspired by the shadows on a coffee table, these 100% wool felt coasters are the ideal companion for cozy winter evenings sharing a warming cup of tea or hot chocolate. The Shadow Coasters are available in 4 colours (pink, purple, light grey and dark grey) and are suitable for mugs up to 8cm in diameter. Care instructions are included. Material: 100% wool felt (5mm thick) Flat packed dimensions: 18x13cm Made in the UK

name: Gills Bowl (Green)
description:
The Gills Bowl is a foldable fruit bowl which is sold as flat object. It is manufactured from laser cut steel and is currently available in 4 colour combinations. 

Material: laser cut steel (stainless steel or white coated steel)
Dimensions (flat): 30 x 30 x 0.2cm
Dimensions (folded): 30 x 30 x 7cm

Made in the UK

name: Blurbs coat hook - single
description:
These coat hooks can bring order–and comic-book communication–to your life.  Using Blurb’s archetypal speech-bubble shape, don’t keep your thoughts to yourself. Simply leave a message on these quirky coat hooks with any dry-erase pen. And if you feel strongly about where your keys or jackets belong, just put up some Blurbs in your hallway, bathroom or bedrooms. 

Ideal for couples, families and children, Blurb coat hooks can make dealing with daily routines much more enjoyable. 

Material: 	        Laser cut, powder coated steel
Colour:	        Bright White
Dimensions:	11cm x 7.5cm x 2cm

Includes wall fixings and dry erase pen. Made in the UK.

name: Reframe bookend
description: Feature your favourite read – or perhaps your flavour of the month – with this functional and distinctive bookend. Reframe celebrates any book by outlining its cover in a contemporary decorative style whilst maintaining order on your shelf. Available in three colours, the Reframe bookend is made from laser cut, powder coated steel. Material: Laser cut, powder coated steel Colours: Bright White, Cherry Red, Powder Blue Dimensions: 15cm x 21cm x 13cm Made in the UK.

name: Reframe memo board (A3)
description: This ornate yet minimal memo board adds functional decoration to your home or office. Reframe is your personal canvas to decorate and celebrate. With magnets included, this fun design is perfect for keeping notes, grocery lists and invitations to hand. Using a dry erase pen, sketch your own artwork or cite a quote of the day, or simply jot down this week's to do list. With this ‘frame’ you aren't committed to one picture or painting. Tack your favourite photo or artwork to the center of Reframe, and replace when you fancy a change. Available in two sizes and three colours the Reframe memo board is ideal for any hallway, study or living room. Material: Laser cut, powder coated steel Colours: Bright White, Cherry Red, Powder Blue Dimensions (A3): 29cm x 40cm Includes wall fixings and magnets. Made in the UK.
